name: Client
description: Static Class present on Client side.

static_functions.name: Disconnect
static_functions.description: Disconnects from the server

static_functions.name: CopyToClipboard
static_functions.description: Copies a text to Clipboard

static_functions.name: SetNearClipPlane
static_functions.description: Sets the Near Clip Plane

static_functions.name: SetEscapeMenuText
static_functions.description: Sets the Escape Menu text

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Supports using <h1>, <h2>, <h3> and <strong> tags in the text.

static_functions.name: ShowNotification
static_functions.description: Shows a notification using the built-in notification system.

parameters.name: add_to_notification_list
parameters.description: Whether to add this notification to the notification list (accessible from the bell icon on the top-right corner)

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Duration in seconds to display the notification

static_functions.name: GetNearClipPlane
static_functions.description: Gets the Near Clip Plane value

static_functions.name: GetConnectedServerIP
static_functions.description: Gets the current connected server IP:Port

static_functions.name: SetDebugEnabled
static_functions.description: Enables/Disables Debug settings and Client Console to be used

static_functions.name: SetSettingGammaOverride
static_functions.description: Overrides the gamma setting and prevents the client from changing it

parameters.name: override
parameters.description: Whether to override the gamma setting

parameters.name: new_gamma
parameters.description: The new gamma value if overriding

static_functions.name: SetHighlightColor
static_functions.description: Changes the Highlight Color for highlighted actors at a specific Index
static_functions.description_long:
Changes the Highlight Color for highlighted actors at a specific Index. Multiply it by 5 (or more) for having a glowing effect.

HighlightMode.Always will always be visible, even behind walls
HighlightMode.OnlyHidden will only be visible if behind a wall
HighlightMode.OnlyVisible will only be visible if not behind a wall

Note: You can only have 3 different indexes (0, 1 or 2).

static_functions.name: SetOutlineColor
static_functions.description: Changes the Outline Color for outlined actors at a specific Index
static_functions.description_long:
Changes the Outline Color for outlined actors at a specific Index. Multiply it by 5 (or more) for having a glowing effect.

Note: You can only have 3 different indexes (0, 1 or 2), and the default Outline color index used by the game is 0 (when interacting with stuff).

static_functions.name: SetValue
static_functions.description: Sets a global value in the Client, which can be accessed from anywhere (client side)
static_functions.description_long:
Sets a global value in the Client, which can be accessed from anywhere (client side)

Please refer to Entity Values for more information

static_functions.name: Subscribe
static_functions.description: Subscribes for an Event

static_functions.name: Unsubscribe
static_functions.description: Unsubscribes from all subscribed Events in this Class and in this Package, optionally passing the function to unsubscribe only that callback

static_functions.name: GetLocalPlayer
static_functions.description: Gets the local Player

static_functions.name: GetFrameTime
static_functions.description: Gets the current Frame Time

static_functions.name: GetTime
static_functions.description: Gets the Unix Epoch Time in milliseconds

static_functions.name: GetLogLevel
static_functions.description: Returns the current log level

static_functions.name: GetEntityByID
static_functions.description: Returns the entity with the specified ID

static_functions.name: GetMap
static_functions.description: Returns the current Map

static_functions.name: IsPackageLoaded
static_functions.description: Returns if a Package is currently loaded

static_functions.name: GetPackages
static_functions.description: Returns a list of Packages running

parameters.name: package_type_filter
parameters.description: Which Package type to return. Leave it default (-1) to return all types.

static_functions.name: GetValue
static_functions.description: Gets a value given a key

return.description: Value at key or fallback if key doesn't exist

static_functions.name: GetAllValuesKeys
static_functions.description: Gets a list of all values keys

return.description: a list with all values keys

events.name: Tick
events.description: Called Every Frame. Do not abuse

events.name: SpawnLocalPlayer
events.description: Called when the local player spawns (just after the game has loaded)

events.name: WindowFocusChange
events.description: Called when the game is focused/unfocused
